1.question: How long does shipping take?
1.answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location. For Medan and surrounding areas, delivery typically takes 1-2 business days. For other regions in Indonesia, it may take 2-5 business days. International shipping is available and typically takes 7-14 business days.

2.question: Are your products organic?
2.answer: Many of our products are certified organic, which is clearly indicated on the product page. We're committed to offering organic options whenever possible, but some products may not have organic certification while still being grown with minimal intervention.

3.question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
3.answer: Yes, we offer wholesale pricing for businesses. Please contact our wholesale department at wholesale@pitaya.com or fill out the contact form selecting 'Wholesale Inquiry' as the subject for more information.

4.question: What is your return policy?
4.answer: We stand behind the quality of our products. If you're not satisfied with your purchase for any reason, please contact us within 7 days of receiving your order. We'll arrange for a replacement or refund as appropriate.

About.heroDesc: Discover the journey behind PITAYA and our commitment to bringing you the finest quality nuts and seeds.
About.story1: PITAYA was founded in 2018 with a simple mission: to provide the highest quality nuts and seeds while supporting sustainable farming practices. What began as a small family business has grown into a trusted brand known for premium products and exceptional customer service.
About.story2: We work directly with farmers across Indonesia and around the world to source the freshest, most flavorful nuts and seeds. By cutting out middlemen, we ensure that our farmers receive fair compensation for their hard work and that our customers receive the best possible products.
About.story3: Every batch of nuts and seeds is carefully selected, processed with minimal intervention, and packaged to preserve freshness. We believe that nature provides the perfect flavors - our job is simply to deliver them to you in their purest form.
About.valuesDesc: At PITAYA, our values guide everything we do. From sourcing to delivery, we're committed to excellence, sustainability, and your satisfaction.

value1.title: Quality First
value1.desc: We never compromise on quality. Every product we offer meets our strict standards for taste, freshness, and nutritional value.

value2.title: Sustainability
value2.desc: We're committed to environmentally responsible practices, from supporting sustainable farming to using eco-friendly packaging.

value3.title: Community
value3.desc: We believe in building strong relationships with our farmers, customers, and communities through fair practices and giving back.

FAQSection.desc: Find answers to common questions about our products, ordering, and shipping.
FAQSection.cta: Still have questions? We're here to help.

1.question: What makes PITAYA nuts and seeds special?
1.answer: PITAYA nuts and seeds are sourced from premium suppliers, carefully selected for quality, and processed to maintain maximum freshness and nutritional value. We ensure all our products are free from additives and preservatives.

2.question: How should I store my nuts and seeds?
2.answer: For optimal freshness, store your nuts and seeds in an airtight container in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. For longer storage (over 3 months), we recommend keeping them in the refrigerator or freezer.

3.question: Are your products suitable for vegans and vegetarians?
3.answer: Yes, all our nuts and seeds are 100% plant-based and suitable for both vegans and vegetarians. They're a great source of protein and essential nutrients for plant-based diets.

4.question: Do you offer international shipping?
4.answer: Currently, we ship throughout Indonesia. For international orders, please contact our customer service team at info@pitaya.com to discuss shipping options and rates.

5.question: What payment methods do you accept?
5.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and e-wallets such as GoPay, OVO, DANA, and LinkAja for your convenience.

6.question: How long will my order take to arrive?
6.answer: Delivery times vary depending on your location. For Medan and surrounding areas, delivery typically takes 1-2 business days. For other regions in Indonesia, it may take 2-5 business days.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At PITAYA, your privacy and trust are our top priorities. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you shop for our premium nuts and seeds, whether online or through our customer service.
privacyPolicy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email, phone number, shipping address, and order details when you make a purchase or contact our support. We may also collect information about your browsing behavior on our website to improve your experience.
privacyPolicy.section2Content: Your information is used to process orders, provide customer support, personalize your shopping experience, and inform you about our latest offers and products. We never sell your data to third parties. Your data may be shared only with trusted partners (such as payment and delivery providers) solely to fulfill your orders.
privacyPolicy.section3Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time. You can also unsubscribe from our marketing communications. For any privacy-related requests, please contact us at info@pitaya.com.
privacyPolicy.section4Content: We implement strict security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or loss. All transactions are encrypted and your personal information is handled with the utmost care.
privacyPolicy.section5Content: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact our team at info@pitaya.com.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions

terms.section1Content: You must use our website and services for lawful purposes only. You agree not to misuse our site, attempt unauthorized access, or disrupt our operations.
terms.section2Content: All orders are subject to availability and confirmation. Prices, product details, and shipping fees are clearly stated before checkout. Payment must be completed before your order is processed.
terms.section3Content: We ship throughout Indonesia using trusted logistics partners. Delivery times may vary depending on your location. You will receive a tracking number once your order is dispatched.
terms.section4Content: If you receive a damaged or incorrect product, please contact us within 7 days for a replacement or refund. Products must be returned in original condition. For more details, see our Returns Policy.

terms.section6Content: PITAYA reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our site means you accept the latest version of our terms.
